query.name: com.txoof.brightspace.terms.id
query.sql: select 'semester' as "type", 'UPDATE' as "action", 'term_'||TERMS.ID as "code", TERMS.NAME as "name", TERMS.FIRSTDAY as "start_date", TERMS.LASTDAY as "end_date", '' as "is_active", '' as "department_code", '' as "template_code", '' as "semester_code", '' as "offering_code", '' as "custom_code" from TERMS TERMS where TERMS.YEARID = 31 order by "code" asc
